title: I touch my finger with a golden pen, A golden pen, a golden pen, I touch my finger with a golden pen, Sign my name up there, Sign my name, sign my name up there, Sign my name, sign my name up there.
lyrics: I touch my finger with a golden pen, A golden pen, a golden pen, I touch my finger with a golden pen, Sign my name up there, Sign my name, sign my name up there, Sign my name, sign my name up there.
lowercaseLyrics:
we shout last night,
we shout the night before,
we will shout tomorrow night
and we'll shout forever more
so that’s the reason why,
the faith will never die,
for the young ones have to come
before the old ones die.
